summary: Import a machine learning model from a workspace
description:
Imports a previously exported machine learning model from a specified workspace location. This is designed for intermediate model retrieval and can handle models in the backend language's native serialization format.

Unlike load_ml_model, this process doesn't require STAC compliance or specific model formats (like ONNX), making it suitable for retrieving temporarily stored models between processes.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the model to import. This should match the name used when the model was exported.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: The folder path within the server backend workspace where the model is stored.

returns.description: The imported machine learning model in its original format.
